Detailed Description

Class that encapsulates ip and port settings for modules.

The values of the settings are initialized when the first call to getIP() or getPort() is made. This way a newly created module is able to use an optional property file. \

How to add entries for a new module: {enumerate} Add constant to {property_t}. This is also the constant that will be used when retrieving the value at run-time. Add string that identifies the ip in a property file to the {m_szProperyIP} array. Add string that identifies the port in a property file to the {m_szProperyPort} array. Add default ip to the {m_szDefaultIP} array. Add default port to the {m_szDefaultPort} array. {enumerate}

Gets main port for a module.

This one uses the getPort and changes the port number to something else so it can not collide with avail and leader ports
